description: Cape Coral's Leading Social Security Disability and Personal Injury Law Firm Located in Cape Coral, Florida. Avard Law Offices offers comprehensive assistance and support to those seeking their Social Security Disability benefits. Serving clients throughout Lee County and the surrounding areas, the attorneys at the law firm devote their time and resources to helping injured and disabled workers obtain the maximum amount possible to support themselves and their families. Also handling Personal Injury, Workers' Compensation, Medical Malpractice, Car Accident, Motorcycle Accident, Veterans' Disability, and Long Term Disability claims. Whether your losses resulted from a motor vehicle accident, medical malpractice or an act of nursing home abuse or neglect, the firm's attorneys will work hard to help you obtain the compensation you deserve. Founded in 1989 by attorney Carol Avard, the law firm has decades of experience, having served the residents of Cape Coral for nearly 30 years. With four (4) attorneys on staff certified in Social Security Disability by the National Board of Trial Advocacy and professionals fluent in Spanish, French, Russian and Ukrainian, the firm stands apart from other practices in the area for being able to offer the dedicated, personalized legal counsel its clients need during their difficult and uncertain times. Let Us Help You Secure Your Future! From assistance with your initial filing to helping you appeal a denied claim. Do not leave your future to chance. You should work with an attorney who has the skills and experience to help you achieve the best possible outcome for your case. The law firm offers free initial consultations with no obligation.
